songs.title: Red Dot
songs.lyrics:
This is what I gotta say
I ain’t talking shit
What it do JO
Ha, what up Knocc?
These niggas fools
Man
Talk to ‘em
And for that’s a  red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let it
Let that lead block
And for that’s a red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead pop


Pull up
Shoot a nigga
There he go
You the nigga
Remove him like
I come from Hoover nigga

But I’m a blocc boy
Glock loaded
Hot toys
We bout it
But ain’t gotta
Shout it
We don’t pop noise
Ain’t out
For the joke
Then somebody
Gotta go
Calling the game
All they seen
Was a body
On the floor
Got that move
On my tennis shoe
Had to call
The clean up crew

Keep it splendid
No forensics
But he’s leaking
Poots
No CSI
Just yes guy
To my chest guy
Shalom
To my rabbi
Bad guys
Get chastized
If you six foot
I hold the mac high
Put one in your brain
To remain this game
You get a black eye

And for that’s
A red dot
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead block
And for that’s a red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead pop

And for that’s
A red dot
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead block
And for that’s a red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead pop

And for that’s
A red dot
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead block
And for that’s a red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead pop

I swear to God
You ever took from me
You better do the race
Cause when I see you
I repay you
With a fulcrum
To the face
That’s a closed casket
And closed case
I stay ready
It’s a cold game
I get bed tough
For the cocaine
I hopped out
In the same lane

My old bitch
Got a same rate
I been getting money
Since the eighth grade
It’s two slides
I will stay raised
If they want war
Make a placate
They don’t know me
So that’s bay cake
They need to go ahead
With that fucked shit
And they mommas
Had the fake crown upset
Can’t talk to me
Unless it’s about Jake
The willow team
It’s like Build a Bear
I’ll build a bitch
Tear down the bong
And designer troops
Like a double Cs
Like a double grip
Like an audible
I’ll still send a flip
I’m speaking facts
So don’t get it twist

Getting rich
That is the mission
I’m really pimpin
And I’m sitting bitch
And I”m really tripping
I keep it dizzy
I’m really strapped
And I keep it with me
If Knocc need me
He’ll come and get me
I’m showing up
With some shit hole 50
Nobody move
Nobody get hurt


First one move
Put his ass
In the dirt

And for that’s a  red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead block
And for that’s a red dot
Pow
That’s a head shot
It ain’t no stopping
On my block
We let that lead pop
